CustomField.description: This field will be activated if the e-mail address was rejected during a campaign. Please check the e-mail address and possibly contact the customer, then clear the checkbox.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field is checked if a mass-email has been hard-bounced. If the email address of this Contact is valid, check the box "Reactivate Email Address" to get this corrected.
CustomField.label: Email invalid
